content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is the frame page of the UBS Budapest User Awareness (BC/DR) Training.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please download the training material by clicking on the below links and read them carefully.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":512367,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/341285f7-64f1-4c12-a85c-5eb76e281fa2/Local Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery Plan.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/341285f7-64f1-4c12-a85c-5eb76e281fa2/Local Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery Plan.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Local Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery Plan.pdf\",\"name\":\"Local Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery Plan.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"341285f7-64f1-4c12-a85c-5eb76e281fa2\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note that for legal reasons, they may have some overlaps with the general EPAM BC/DR training.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
